## Python: Hello, World!
```python
print("Hello, World!")
```

**Exercise:** edit the message and run again.

---

## JavaScript: Hello, DOM!
```html
<button id="btn">Click me</button>
<script>
  document.getElementById('btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
    alert('Hello from JS!');
  });
</script>
```

---

## Recap
- Programs are instructions
- Python great for CLI logic
- JS controls the browser DOM
